casebody.data:
James Wallace DAVIS, Jr.
v.
Teresa L. HIER, Frye and Booth. No. 262P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. James Wallace Davis, Jr., Pro Se. Teresa L. Hier, Winston-Salem, Pro Se, for Teresa L. Hier et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 16th day of May 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th day of June 2005."
